channel.title: Mind the Grow
channel.description: Recent content on Mind the Grow

item.title: Social Consumption License
item.description: Proposition A client approached us with interest in exploring the feasibility of opening up a new Cannabis Consumption Enterprise in Denver, CO (our home-base!). The passing of Initiative 300 to legalize designated areas for the consumption of cannabis products was exciting, but the legal hoops to jump through are numerous, so it is no surprise that there is a severe paucity of operational businesses. At the time of this writing (mid-2018), only two are operational.

item.title: Work
item.description: The Green Rush has resulted in a skewed marketplace subject to price volatility. Diversification is the key to weathering the storm of wild market swings. Identifying strategies to find a sustainable market niche is becoming a necessity. No matter how uncertain or complex your problem seems, Mind the Grow provides you with custom solutions for all stages of the agricultural production cycle, from seed to store Insights We dig deep into your companyâ€™s data to discover opportunities and problem areas.
